page.title: 14My house -B
page.content: My house was built in 1880. It is a Victorian house. It has 5 bedrooms,a bathroom.2 cloakrooms,3 reception rooms, a double garage, a kitchen, a boxroom, a linen room and a utility room. The garden is 3/4 of an acre.In the garden we have a pond, a greenhouse, a barn and a potting shed. We also have a wood store and a apple store. In evey bedroom there is a cast iron fireplace with decorations on it. We have had the kitchen modernised but we still have the servants bells hanging on the wall. We still have an old-fashioned pantry with marble shelves. The north wing of the house had an extension built in 1937. Altogether the house has got fifteen rooms, not including the garage. The house is coloured pink and white.
